column5: Just wondering if anyone knows of any lakes we could dump some small boats in around Pickle Lake (within an hour)that hold Lake Trout or Northerns that run a bit bigger. We're only going to have a day or two to do this but looking for a different adventure besides Kapkichi. WOULD REALLY APPRECIATE ANY ADVICE!
Head up the road north about 30 miles to Mud Lake for Pike. Not sure aboaut Trout.
get a hold of lenray .........he's the man for what you are looking for
